arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca shares true Jadon Sancho feelings with simple demand to Man Utd flop
arts.sum: Jadon Sancho signed for Chelsea on loan from Manchester United on transfer deadline day in August and has enjoyed an impressive start to the Premier League season

arts.ttl: Sir Alex Ferguson would have approved after Man Utd youngsters inspire Brentford comeback
arts.sum: Former Manchester United manager Sir Alex Ferguson wasn't present to see his old club come from behind to deliver an important come-from-behind victory over Brentford

arts.ttl: Man Utd 2-1 Brentford: Player ratings as Red Devils come from behind in impressive win
arts.sum: Garnacho stung Flekken's gloves midway through the first half as United grew into the game, while down the other end, Andre Onana had to make an excellent save to deny Christian Norgaard from range. DM: Casemiro - 7/10 - Lacked the energy to cope with Brentford's energetic press in the first half but looked far more useful after the break when United established their control.

arts.ttl: Frank disappointed with Brentford’s second-half display
arts.sum: Bees reaction. The post Frank disappointed with Brentford’s second-half display appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Man United ‘angry’ over De Ligt incident in Brentford win
arts.sum: Man United boss Erik ten Hag says his team were “angry” after Brentford scored from a corner after Matthijs de Ligt was ordered to leave the pitch with a bloody head. The Dutch defender collided with Kevin Schade’s knee after going for the ball with his head, causing him to bleed profusely. He returned to […] The post Man United ‘angry’ over De Ligt incident in Brentford win first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Erik ten Hag reacts to Man Utd 2 Brentford 1 19 Oct 2024
arts.sum: At United, we have to win games but also to win entertaining and I think everyone was enjoying the afternoon, especially the way it happened. We conceded an unfair goal but, in the second half, we showed, as a team, we are together.

arts.ttl: Erik ten Hag sends statement after beating potential Man Utd successor in Thomas Frank
arts.sum: Manchester United had to come from behind to beat Brentford 2-1, with Alejandro Garnacho and Rasmus Hojlund finding the back of the net after Ethan Pinnock gave the Bees the lead

arts.ttl: Man Utd used anger as fuel - Ten Hag on controversial Brentford goal
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Erik Ten Hag says his side used their "anger as fuel" to comeback from a goal down after Brentford's "unfair" opener was given in their 2-1 win over the visitors in the Premier League at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Garnacho, Hojlund impress as Mbeumo struggles in Man United's win over Brentford
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides player ratings from Man United's 2-1 win against Brentford in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: It was a game of two halves - Frank on Brentford defeat by Man Utd
arts.sum: Brentford manager Thomas Frank says his side "did a lot of things right" in the first 45 minutes before a "disappointing" second half led to a 2-1 defeat by Manchester United in the Premier League at Old Trafford.
